00014   template <typename AssertImpl>  
00015   class SIMD_API AssertBase : public AssertImpl {
00016   public:
00017     inline static void precondition(bool condition) {
00018       AssertImpl::precondition(condition);
00019     }
00020   
00021     inline static void precondition(bool condition, 
00022                                     const std::string& what) {
00023       AssertImpl::precondition(condition, what);
00024     }
00025

00027                                     const std::string& what, 
00028                                     const std::string& where) {
00029       AssertImpl::precondition(condition,
00030                                what,
00031                                where);
00032     }
00033   
00034     inline static void postcondition(bool condition) {
00035       AssertImpl::postcondition(condition);
00036     }
00037 
00038     inline static void postcondition(bool condition, 
00039                                      const std::string& what) {
00040       AssertImpl::postcondition(condition,
00041                                 what);
00042     }
00043 
00044     inline static void postcondition(bool condition, 
00045                                      const std::string& what, 
00046                                      const std::string& where) {
00047       AssertImpl::postcondition(condition,
00048                                 what,
00049                                 where);
00050     }
00051   
00052 
00053     inline static void invariant(bool condition) {
00054       AssertImpl::invariant(condition);
00055     }
00056 
00057     inline static void invariant(bool condition, 
00058                                  const std::string& what) {
00059       AssertImpl::invariant(condition, what);
00060     }
00061 
00062     inline static void invariant(bool condition, 
00063                                  const std::string& what, 
00064                                  const std::string& where) {
00065       AssertImpl::invariant(condition,
00066                             what,
00067                             where);
